languages.text: Омерзительная тварь за толстым стеклом не подает признаков жизни.

traits.locale_text: В колбе непонятное существо, не естественного происхождения.

languages.text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.
languages.original_text: Омерзительная тварь за толстым стеклом не подает признаков жизни.

traits.locale_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

languages.text: Die entsetzliche Kreatur hinter dem dicken Glas zeigt keine Anzeichen von Leben.
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: Die entsetzliche Kreatur hinter dem dicken Glas zeigt keine Anzeichen von Leben.

languages.text: La créature cauchemardesque de l'autre côté de l'épaisse vitre ne montre aucun signe de vie.
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: La créature cauchemardesque de l'autre côté de l'épaisse vitre ne montre aucun signe de vie.

languages.text: La abominación que hay al otro lado del grueso cristal no parece mostrar ningún signo de vida.
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: La abominación que hay al otro lado del grueso cristal no parece mostrar ningún signo de vida.

languages.text: 厚玻璃后面那只怪物没有任何生命迹象。
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: 厚玻璃后面那只怪物没有任何生命迹象。

languages.text: 分厚いガラスの向こうにいる忌まわしい生物は、生命の兆候をまったく見せていない。
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: 分厚いガラスの向こうにいる忌まわしい生物は、生命の兆候をまったく見せていない。

languages.text: Kalın camın ardındaki iğrenç yaratık, hiçbir yaşam belirtisi göstermiyor.
languages.original_text: The abominable creature behind the thick glass is showing no signs of life.

traits.locale_text: Kalın camın ardındaki iğrenç yaratık, hiçbir yaşam belirtisi göstermiyor.
